title: Practice-Centered Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Through Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Environment enabling immediate application of learning content through work integration for field practitioners. Emphasizes asynchronous learning and collaborative activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can propose mathematical problem-solving strategies using online discussion and collaboration tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners can analyze real-world workplace cases and design mathematical modeling processes using non-real-time content within a learning management system (LMS).
Learners can submit final deliverables applying mathematical knowledge acquired in a blended learning environment to practical tasks through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
